name: dspy-skills
description: Collection of skills for DSPy framework - program language models, optimize prompts, and build RAG pipelines systematically.

plugins.name: dspy-rag-pipeline
plugins.description: Build RAG pipelines with retrieval-augmented generation using ColBERTv2 and DSPy optimization

plugins.name: dspy-bootstrap-fewshot
plugins.description: Auto-generate few-shot demonstrations using teacher models for quick DSPy optimization with 10-50 examples

plugins.name: dspy-evaluation-suite
plugins.description: Test and measure DSPy program quality with built-in and custom evaluation metrics

plugins.name: dspy-finetune-bootstrap
plugins.description: Distill DSPy programs into fine-tuned model weights for production deployment and cost reduction

plugins.name: dspy-gepa-reflective
plugins.description: Optimize complex agents and agentic systems using LLM reflection on execution trajectories

plugins.name: dspy-haystack-integration
plugins.description: Integrate DSPy optimization into existing Haystack pipelines for automatic prompt improvement

plugins.name: dspy-miprov2-optimizer
plugins.description: State-of-the-art Bayesian optimization for DSPy programs with 200+ examples using joint instruction and demo tuning

plugins.name: dspy-signature-designer
plugins.description: Design type-safe input/output specifications for DSPy modules with Pydantic support and advanced type hints

plugins.name: dspy-react-agent-builder
plugins.description: Build production ReAct agents with tool integration, GEPA optimization, and error handling for multi-step reasoning tasks

plugins.name: dspy-debugging-observability
plugins.description: Debug and monitor DSPy programs with MLflow tracing, custom callbacks, and production cost/latency tracking

plugins.name: dspy-output-refinement-constraints
plugins.description: Improve output quality with iterative refinement and constraint validation using dspy.Refine and dspy.BestofN

plugins.name: dspy-simba-optimizer
plugins.description: Alternative Bayesian optimizer with mini-batch statistical optimization for custom feedback scenarios and agentic tasks

plugins.name: dspy-advanced-module-composition
plugins.description: Compose complex pipelines with ensemble voting, multi-chain comparison, and sequential/parallel module patterns

plugins.name: dspy-custom-module-design
plugins.description: Design production-quality custom DSPy modules with proper architecture, state management, and serialization patterns
